title: Citibank Taiwan Celebrates 10th Anniversary of Citigold Wealth Management; Launches Citigold Private Client
summary: Citibank Taiwan Ltd. today celebrated the 10th anniversary of its Citigold Wealth Management and launched Citigold Private Client (CPC), a new and powerful wealth management proposition that sets a new standard in meeting the needs of high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs) with assets under management of NT$30 million.
tag-1: Citibank Taiwan Celebrates 10th Anniversary of Citigold Wealth Management; Launches Citigold Private Client
tag-3: Citibank Taiwan Ltd. today celebrated the 10th anniversary of its Citigold Wealth Management and launched Citigold Private Client (CPC), a new and powerful wealth management proposition that sets a new standard in meeting the needs of high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs) with assets under management of NT$30 million.
tag-4: CPC integrates the exclusivity of Citigroup's global network with a holistic and personalized service to help clients in managing their overall assets. Clients will enjoy unrivalled access to Citi's global banking network, products and services offered across the entire franchise, including transactional banking, capital markets and advisory, and business banking solutions.
tag-5: Citigroup first launched its Citigold Wealth Management service in 1987, instituting its global wealth management business. In 2001, Citibank Taiwan pioneered wealth management in Taiwan, with the launch of Citigold.
tag-6: Yunny Lee, head of Citibank Taiwan Retail Banking, said, "As the pioneer and market leader of wealth management in Taiwan, we are continuously looking to innovate. We launched Citigold in 2001, demonstrating the concepts of 'Citigold Wealth Management Triangle' and '360-degree Wealth Management' that provided an overall evaluation and management of clients' assets.
tag-7: "We launched 'Citigold Global Access' in 2007 and 'Citigold Global Banking' in 2008, providing clients access to Citibank's service around the globe. In recent years, we have leveraged Citi's unique global strength to offer 'Global Transfer,' 'Global View' as well as 'Smart Banking' in 2010 to meet the growing and changing needs of our clients. With the completion of our integration with BOOC in 2009, we have also expanded to 65 branches around Taiwan, providing a wider range of service channels in main cities and counties across the island. Not only have we established a new business model, we have also introduced a brand new banking experience, which is totally different," added Yunny.
tag-8: "CPC is unique as it is an all-encompassing wealth management proposition that meets the full spectrum of clients' financial needs. It caters not only to the clients but also their families and companies with products and services that go beyond typical banking solutions. In listening to the needs of our HNWIs, we can expand our services to facilitate their business around the world, too. We are keen to share Citi's best products, practices and resources to help our clients achieve success in their work and personal life," said Yunny.
tag-9: According to the Capgemini-Merrill Lynch Wealth Report 2009, Asia Pacific (which is recovering faster than other economies) is expected to be one of the strongest drivers of global wealth in the coming years. The combined wealth of Asia Pacific's HNWIs is estimated to grow at an annual rate of 12.8 percent by 2013, surpassing the global average of 8.1 percent. This demonstrates the importance of wealth management in Taiwan as it is a significant market for Citigroup in Asia Pacific.
tag-10: Salman Haider, Regional Head of Citigold Private Client, Citibank Asia Pacific, said: "Today's launch of CPC in Taiwan marks a major milestone not only for Citibank in Taiwan but also in Asia Pacific. As recent wealth surveys indicate, the number of HNWIs in Taiwan is expected to grow by 15 to 20 percent over the next three to five years. Citibank's new CPC proposition seeks to serve the growing segment of wealthy individuals who demand customized services, holistic advisory and access to sophisticated financial solutions. Our existing distribution network and capabilities in Taiwan position us very well to deliver an enhanced banking experience for our HNW clients. With the launch of the CPC proposition in Taiwan, we now serve this particular HNW segment in four countries across Asia, including Hong Kong, Singapore and China. By year-end, we plan to expand our footprint to India, Korea and Japan."
tag-11: CPC clients enjoy unrivalled access to Citi's global banking network, products and services offered across Citi's entire franchise, including transactional banking, capital markets and advisory, and business banking solutions. Client portfolios will be managed by an experienced wealth management team, including financial researchers, relationship managers, marketing and planning executives. As most clients are also business owners, CPC will extend its service to their companies. Clients will also enjoy global access service that covers their travel, housekeeping, leisure and entertainment needs.
tag-12: CPC will be provided exclusively at five branches in Taiwan, including the Citibank Business Department in Taipei Xinyi district, Song-Chiang branch, Hsin-Chu branch, Taichung and Kaohsiung branch.
tag-13: Citi Citi, a leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
